MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 area of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:29am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived onsite in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:09am on Sunday, 06 December 2020
